'Threshold' is a 1990 novel by Chris Morris and Janet Morris. It is the first
book of its namesake trilogy.

In a futuristic world, Earth is now a preserve. A captain is transported 500
years into the future and onto Threshold, which is a space habitat. Here he
meets with the daughter of a Muslim leader, one of many who are being kept from
their travel to Mecca.
